title: Connect 4

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, scout someone. You will learn how long their connected line is.
- During the night, place a Green, White, Red, or Wild chip in between two players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Town is a circle.
- Players are assigned colors based on their alignment. The Good faction is Green, REFs and NKs are Red, and other Neutrals are White. When you scout someone, you learn how many connecting people/chips have the same color, including the target. (e.g. if you scout a Townie with one Town neighbor and the other surrounding players are Evil, you get a result of 2.)
- Whenever someone is part of a line of four of the same color, they die. All chips that were part of this sequence are removed from play.
- Wild chips can count for any color. You may only place 2 Wild chips throughout the game.
- Once only yourself and four other people are alive, you may place two chips each night.
- At the start of the game, no one can be part of a sequence of 4.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
